results.content: Mr. Kalob is one of the best instructors online that you can find. Thank you Mr. Kalob for this superb JavaScript101 course.

results.content: Kalob is my best! Right to the point, clear, concise. I'm so grateful to have access to his courses, also a great mention to his constant presence on his Facebook group!

results.content: The instructor is engaging, isn't moving too fast through the topics, and assumes we don't know anything about these topics.
results.content_html: The instructor is engaging, isn't moving too fast through the topics, and assumes we don't know anything about these topics.

results.content: I was always wondering about usage of console while I was learning HTML and CSS. My questions are totally answered.  It is time to move Kalob's other 2 JavaScript Lessons.

results.content: Good choice to immerse into JS.
It's great, very informative and easy to follow.
results.content_html: It's great, very informative and easy to follow.

results.content: I have taken other courses taught by Kolab. As soon as I got the email, I signed up for this course. I am really looking forward to working on this course which is for complete beginners javascript. Kolab has a great teaching style, and he is extremely knowledgeable and funny too. It looks like he has raised the bar with this course! I highly recommend this course for anyone interested in learning javascript who is the ultimate beginner. Thanks, Kolab for making this course. I learned a lot from this course

results.content: Definitely another 5* course from Mr. Kalob. He is one of the best instructors online that you can find. I'm also a member of his growing community on facebook and I am sure you'll gonna enjoy his courses including this brand new one!. Thank you Mr. Kalob for this superb JS101 course.

response.content: Amazing, I'm so happy you enjoyed this course. Happy coding!

results.content: Knowledgeable instructor, great teaching methods, clear and concise explanations sorta sums up this course. Oh and he keeps on pushing you with "homework" and quizzes. The best part is the last project which is to find and fix a problem on a js file on a website. It kinda feels more real than just fixing a random practice file if you know what I mean.
